about_the_game:
Symphorix isn't just another bullet hell. It's a rhythmic roguelite where your music becomes the ultimate weapon. Awaken as a Core – a being of pure energy – and battle through dynamic, procedurally generated soundscapes. Every beat, every note, shapes the battlefield, spawning unique enemies and unleashing a symphony of destruction. Prepare for an audiovisual experience that will test your reflexes, your strategy, and your connection to the rhythm.

  • Music Is the Gameplay: Forget passive listening – in Symphorix, the song dictates the action. Enemy attacks, energy pulses, boss battles, and even the environment itself are all born from the rhythm and notes. The music is your tactical guide, your greatest weapon, and the key to survival.

  • Your Music, Your Universe: Unleash your own MP3 library and watch Symphorix transform your favorite tracks into unique, pulse-pounding challenges. Or explore over 153 original songs, spanning a vast range of genres, each accompanied by evocative, developer-crafted poetry. Feel like truly becoming one with the game? Use "Live Mode" to have the action be defined by any audio your computer plays.

  • Enemies Born from the Beat: Every song spawns unique enemies and bosses, their behaviors and attacks crafted by the rhythm itself. Face swarms of projectiles during intense crescendos, dodge intricate patterns in melodic passages, and confront colossal bosses that embody the song's climax. No two songs play the same.

  • Forge Your Destiny: Deep Core Customization: Before each run, you'll sculpt your Core's power. Strategically configure energy emitters – will you choose focused beams, wide sprays, or something more exotic? Will your energy orbit you, or seek out enemies on its own? The possibilities are vast, and the choices are yours.

  • Unpredictable Power: Emergent Gameplay: Symphorix isn't just about pre-planned builds; it's about discovering emergent possibilities. The interplay between your Core's configuration, the song's structure, and the procedurally generated enemies will lead to unexpected synergies and breathtaking moments.

    Imagine:
    * Projectiles that bounce wildly, creating a chaotic storm of energy.
    * Persistent fields of damage that turn the arena into a deadly gauntlet.
    * Swarms of seeking energy, blanketing the screen in a vibrant, destructive dance.

    These are just a few of the powers you can unlock.

  • Bosses Forged from the Song: Each track culminates in a showdown with a unique, procedurally generated boss. Its very form and attacks are drawn from the song's core elements, creating a final challenge that embodies the music itself. Even on familiar songs, expect the unexpected.

  • The Roguelite Rhythm Never Ends: Designed for endless replayability, Symphorix offers a constant stream of new challenges:
    * Procedural Generation: Every song, every enemy, every boss is unique.
    * Deep Progression: Unlock a vast array of customization options, constantly evolving your playstyle.
    * Emergent Gamepla: Discover new strategies and surprising combinations with every run.

  • Invest in Your Power: Earn rewards with every run, and strategically invest in your Core's long-term growth. Shape your destiny and prepare for even greater challenges.

  • A Sensory Symphony: Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant colors, pulsating light, and dynamic effects, all synchronized to the rhythm. Symphorix is an audiovisual experience that will captivate your senses.

  • Claim Your Place on the Leaderboards: Compete against players around the globe to achieve the highest score on each song. Master the music, perfect your build, and become a legend of the Symphorix universe.

ARE YOU READY TO SYNC WITH THE COSMOS AND BECOME A RHYTHM WARRIOR?
PLAY SYMPHORIX AND EXPERIENCE A BULLET HELL REBORN THROUGH THE POWER OF MUSIC!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (2 GB) (DirectX 11 compatible GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: While it’s primarily a 2D game, it does use VFX Graph-based effects and simple 3D meshes, so a dedicated GPU is highly recommended over integrated graphics. The game is music-based, so a decent sound setup (headphones or speakers) is recommended for the best experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (or newer) / AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4 GB) (DirectX 11/12 compatible GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Because the game uses extensive particle effects and real-time VFX, a mid-range GPU will ensure smoother performance. For optimal audio fidelity in a music-centric game, consider higher-quality sound gear and updated drivers.

short_description: Symphorix is a top-down 2D time-survival, bullet-hell, twin-stick shooter where every beat drives the action. Enter the role of a newly born Core, a sentient energy entity, and explore a rhythmic cosmos where enemies attack & sync perfectly with the music. Embrace the rhythm, and unleash your power.
